TopicTitle: [1.0] MP-2 Seahorse Multipurpose Aircraft (United Aces of Jeb)

Articles.Content:
![CpmIfwK.png](http://i.imgur.com/CpmIfwK.png)

From the Untied Aces of Jebediah; engineering corps comes the MP-2 "SeaHorse" Series. A set of 5 minimalist utility jets, each carrying different loads:

-MP-2 is the base model with no special equipment you can customize it to your needs/desires

-MP-2T is the tanker model for long distance flights and refueling (Plus when the wing tanks are empty they double as bombs ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif))

-MP-2X is the Experimental model we used for testing some new tech (RATOL, Cargo Drop, Plane-Mounted Parachute)

-MP-2KC is the Kerbal Carrier for transporting 6 Kerbals (plus the pilot) around

-MP-2S is the Science model for dropping a scientific probe into an area for experimentation

![wyiOb3E.png](http://i.imgur.com/wyiOb3E.png)

MP-2 Specs:

Weight: 9.2 Tons

Parts: 54

Fuel: 408

Top Speed: 270 M/S

Price: $20,505

![kEMcfD8.png](http://i.imgur.com/kEMcfD8.png)

MP-2T Specs:

Weight: 13.9 Tons

Parts: 68

Fuel: 1068

Top Speed: 220 M/S

Price: $27,858

![8Y6Rxnt.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/8Y6Rxnt.png?1)

![YFFyJka.png](http://i.imgur.com/YFFyJka.png)
